name: 5. XH overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play the XH map on this difficulty. It takes effect at 200% difficulty. The computer hero has 8 times the experience and the town creatures have 4 times the weekly production.

chinese.name: 5. XH overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩XH图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄8倍经验，城镇生物4倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
